body_html:
Work / life has been a bit hectic lately. Sorry for the long delay.
I think I addressed all of the comments as well as added a few tests.

What still needs to be done (possibly not this PR):
1.) Adding support for inference.
2.) fully connected (2D) batch normalization -- should this be a separate op? If not, what should be done with data_format?

Let me know what else needs to be fixed and thanks for the help.
@vrv @zheng-xq

I think I addressed all of the comments as well as added a few tests.

What still needs to be done (possibly not this PR):
